full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement: 23-58137

#### Replacement of Cold Room L-431

The National Research Council Canada (NRC) invites tenders for a project to replace Cold Room L-431 located at 6100 Royalmount Ave, Montreal, QC.

#### Project Background

The scope of work consists of the demolition and replacement of Cold Room L-431 with new refrigeration equipment, electrical, and mechanical systems. This project aims to enhance the overall performance and functionality of the building.

#### Tender Requirements

Tenders are to be submitted electronically via email to [NRC.BidReceiving-ReceptiondesSoumissions.CNRC@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca](mailto:NRC.BidReceiving-ReceptiondesSoumissions.CNRC@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca) with the mandatory format and inclusions as specified in the tender package.

#### Mandatory Site Visit

Attend one of the mandatory site visits on October 17th or 18th, 2023 at 10:00 a.m. at 6100 Royalmount Ave, Montreal, QC. Bidders must sign the attendance form to confirm participation.

#### Tender Submission

Tenders must be received by November 9th, 2023 at 14:00. Late submissions will not be accepted.

#### Security Requirements

1.  All personnel involved in the project must undergo Reliability screening prior to commencing work.
2.  A valid CSST (Commission de la santé et de la sécurité du travail) certificate must be submitted with the tender or prior to contract award.

#### Dispute Resolution

The Procurement Ombudsman is available to provide dispute resolution services. Contact the Procurement Ombudsman at [boa.opo@boa-opc.gc.ca](mailto:boa.opo@boa-opc.gc.ca) or 1-866-734-5169 for assistance.
